ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Need non-kos mage for Chardok on Tribunal
ygData.msgSnippet: Im a lvl 60 mage that is non Kos in chardok, It took a ton of time working on that faction, but Im on the Solesk Ro server so I really cant  help. Nakoor ...
ygData.messageBody:
Im a lvl 60 mage that is non Kos in chardok, It took a ton of time working on that faction, but Im on the Solesk Ro server so I really cant  help.
 
Nakoor
----- Original Message -----
From: Su
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Thursday, February 27, 2003 5:46 PM
Subject: [EverQuest] Need non-kos mage for Chardok on Tribunal

Ok I normally don't resort to begging, but I'm desperate here.
I recently scheduled a raid for Chardok to kill Overking Bathezid for my
cleric epic.
I had druids, tanks, high lvl clerics, etc.. Unfortunately the mage that was
supposed to come was a no-show. So the raid had to be cancelled as we didn't
have enough people to fight their way in.
I then realized that I don't even know any high level mages who are not kos
in chardok (and who have the ability to summon people to them).
If you know anyone who has such a character or are such a person, please
please please let me know. I will give free rezzes with my click stick once
I get it.
Thanks in advance.
luv,
-Su aka Conwyn 54 cleric
The Tribunal



Visit the EverQuest homepage at http://www.everquest.com
